name: SwearJar
0:
”Alexa, ask Swear Jar what is the balance?”
”Alexa, tell Swear Jar to add three dollars.”
”Alexa, ask Swear Jar for the history.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: swear jar
des: Swear Jar will be your virtual bank to keep track of when people use bad words. All you have to do is tell Alexa how much money to add or remove - you can determine how much a bad word is worth. For example you can say, 'Alexa, ask Swear Jar what is the balance? ', 'Alexa, tell Swear Jar to remove fifty cents. ' and 'Alexa, tell Swear Jar to add three dollars. '. If you say 'Alexa, ask Swear Jar for the history.', Alexa will tell you up to the last 5 transactions saying the amount and how long ago the event occurred. If you have a video device, all transactions will be displayed. To delete the balance and all transactions just say 'Alexa, tell Swear Jar to empty the jar. '.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
